On this page

1. Access Admin Panel ‚Äã

After installation, access your admin panel:

http://your-domain.com/admin

Login with credentials created during installation.

2. Configure Site Settings ‚Äã

Go to Settings ‚Üí General:

  • Set site name and description
  • Upload logo and favicon
  • Configure email settings
  • Set timezone

3. Create Your First Page ‚Äã

Content ‚Üí Pages ‚Üí New Page:

markdown
Title: Welcome to My Site
Slug: welcome
Status: Published

Content:
Welcome to my amazing website built with larpress!

4. Create a Menu ‚Äã

Content ‚Üí Menus ‚Üí Create Menu:

Name: Main Menu
Location: Header

Items:
- Home (/)
- About (/about)
- Contact (/contact)

Common Tasks ‚Äã

Creating Content ‚Äã

Blog Post ‚Äã

markdown
Title: My First Blog Post
Category: News
Tags: laravel, cms
Featured Image: (upload image)
Status: Published

Write your amazing content here...

HTML Block ‚Äã

html
<div class="alert alert-info">
  <strong>Notice:</strong> This is a reusable HTML block!
</div>

Use shortcode: [block:alert-info]

Managing Users ‚Äã

Access Control ‚Üí Users ‚Üí Create User:

Name: John Doe
Email: john@example.com
Role: Editor
Password: (generate secure password)

Creating Roles ‚Äã

Access Control ‚Üí Roles ‚Üí Create Role:

Name: Content Manager
Permissions:
‚òë View content
‚òë Create content
‚òë Edit content
‚òê Delete content
‚òê Access settings

Email Templates ‚Äã

Communication ‚Üí Email Templates ‚Üí Create Template:

Name: Welcome Email
Subject: Welcome to {site_name}!
Type: User Registration

Body:
Hello {user_name},

Welcome to {site_name}! We're excited to have you.

Best regards,
The Team

Creating a Module ‚Äã

bash
# Generate module structure
php artisan module:make Blog

# Edit module files
modules/Blog/
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Http/Controllers/
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Models/
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Views/
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ routes/
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ module.json

Creating a Theme ‚Äã

bash
# Generate theme structure
php artisan theme:make MyTheme

# Edit theme files
themes/MyTheme/
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ views/
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ assets/
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ public/
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ theme.json

Performance Tips ‚Äã

  1. Enable Redis for caching
  2. Use queue for emails
  3. Optimize images before upload
  4. Enable OPcache
  5. Use CDN for assets

Security Tips ‚Äã

  1. Change admin URL
  2. Enable 2FA
  3. Use strong passwords
  4. Enable IP restrictions
  5. Keep larpress updated
  6. Regular backups

Happy building with larpress! üöÄ
